Brigitte Bardot has died aged 91
subhed: The actress who triggered a revolution with her performance in 'And God Created Woman' passed away on December 28 at the age of 91. She appeared in 56 films before ending her career in 1973 and devoting her life to animal rights.

The flights of fancy of the French entrepreneur who brought Shein to Paris
subhed: Since bringing Chinese retail giant Shein to Paris's BHV department store, Frédéric Merlin has faced a barrage of criticism. Presenting himself as a self-made man from a middle-class background, in reality the 34-year-old is thriving on lucrative real estate deals and unpaid debts.

title: US and Nigeria offer diverging accounts of strikes on militants
subhed: Washington and Abuja agree that the Christmas-timed operation targeted Islamic State-linked militants, but they give conflicting accounts of which groups were struck and how the attacks were carried out.

title: How the Swiss Alps are pushing higher to preserve access to snow
subhed: Zermatt, the famous ski resort at the foot of the Matterhorn, has invested hundreds of millions of Swiss francs to ensure skiing for its customers nearly year-round, despite global warming. It is a relentless strategy – criticized, but profitable.

title: Trump, the Apocalypse and King David: A theological reading of the US president
subhed: Since his first term, the American president has frequently made apocalyptic and messianic references. Some supporters compare him to biblical figures such as King David, appealing particularly to evangelical Christians, who make up about one-fifth of Americans.

subhed: Even though the photo galleries of their 'parents' are typically replete with dog photos, a new generation of professional photographers is nonetheless making a living out of artfully crafted canine portraits.

title: Why more young people are turning to religion
subhed: Many researchers have observed a resurgence of religious commitment among young people in France, often accompanied by a certain rigorism. This renewed spiritual quest is linked both to the anxieties of our era and, at times, a search for identity.

title: Mariupol, Ukraine: A model city of 'new Russia'
subhed: Since 2015, photographer Gabriele Micalizzi has been documenting the Donbas region from the Russian side of the front line, an area where Moscow enforces very strict access conditions for journalists. In November, he secured permission to enter Donetsk Oblast, a region of occupied Ukraine, and traveled to Mariupol, a city destroyed by Russian forces in 2022, which has since been colonized and rebuilt in record time.
